mapper.sql: rowid, COMPANY_CODE, PRO_NO, HEALTH_CODE, HEALTH_NAME, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS
mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.pro_name, t2.category_code, t3.category_name from pm_device_health t1 left join pm_base t2 on t2.pro_no = t1.pro_no left join pm_category t3 on t3.category_code = t2.category_code where t1.rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into pm_device_health (rowid, COMPANY_CODE, PRO_NO, HEALTH_CODE, HEALTH_NAME, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS) values (#{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{healthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{healthName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), null, null, 1, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into pm_device_health
rowid,
COMPANY_CODE,
PRO_NO,
HEALTH_CODE,
HEALTH_NAME,
SYS_CREATE_TIME,
SYS_UPDATE_TIME,
SYS_DELETE_TIME,
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG,
REMARKS,
#{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{proNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{healthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{healthName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update pm_device_health
COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_NO = #{proNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEALTH_CODE = #{healthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEALTH_NAME = #{healthName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = now(),
SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pm_device_health set COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_NO = #{proNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HEALTH_CODE = #{healthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HEALTH_NAME = #{healthName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from pm_device_health t1 left join pm_base t2 on t2.pro_no=t1.pro_no where 1=1 and t1.company_code = #{companyCode}
and t1.pro_no = #{proNo}
